query: "Was my sodium level normal during my last check-up on December 28, 2020?"
resource_summaries: This record is an observation of a laboratory test for Sodium (Na) conducted on a patient on December 28, 2020, showing a value of 140.07 mmol/L.
answer: Yes, your sodium level during your last check-up on December 28, 2020, was 140.07 mmol/L. This value falls within the normal range for sodium levels, which is typically between 135-145 mmol/L.
